timeline.bodyText:
in the old class type of field and getters was arraylist.
ok to change?
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: For the field it should be okay, for the getters it can break backwardscompatibility
replies.author: tivervac

replies.bodyText: yes but there is a noreference on the class
replies.author: cdietrich

+package org.eclipse.xtext.ide.editor.contentassist;

+import com.google.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.xtext.ide.editor.contentassist.ContentAssistContext;
+import org.eclipse.xtext.ide.editor.contentassist.ContentAssistEntry;

+import org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.Procedures.Procedure1;
+import org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.StringExtensions;

+/**
+ * Factory for content assist entries. Whenever possible, you should use this creator instead of building entries
+ * directly, since prefix matching and conflict handling is done here.
+ * 
+ * @since 2.10
+ * @noreference
+ */
+@SuppressWarnings("all")
